cohortName: [PL 80809001] Rheumatoid arthritis referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (80809) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 80809002] Rheumatoid arthritis referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (80809) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 80809003] Rheumatoid arthritis at first diagnosis (no history of Rheumatoid arthritis)
logicDescription: Rheumatoid Arthritis at first diagnosis with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.
Rheumatoid Arthritis Hanly (2015) 2+ codes least 2 months apart
Rheumatoid Arthritis Ng (2012) 2+ codes with at least one RA codes in a rheumatologist visit
Rheumatoid Arthritis Ng (2012) 2+ codes with at least one rheumatology visit and with the last rheumatologist visit with a RA code
Rheumatoid Arthritis Ng (2012) 2+ codes with 180D+ DMARD therapy
Rheumatoid Arthritis Ng (2012) 2+ codes with at least one RA codes in a rheumatologist visit with 180D+ DMARD therapy
Rheumatoid Arthritis Ng (2012) 2+ codes with at least one rheumatology visit and with the last rheumatologist visit with a RA codes with 180D+ DMARD therapy
Rheumatoid Arthritis Widdifield (2014) 1+ codes ever by a specialist (rheumatologist, internal medicine, orthopedic surgeon)
Rheumatoid Arthritis Widdifield (2014) 2+ codes in 1 year
